name: Dusty the Lazy Cat
storyline: Dusty must journey through various worlds and levels, solving numerous puzzles along the way. Some puzzles require him to collect certain items, which he must search for on each island. However, there are obstacles that must be overcome to access each island and enemies that will attempt to eliminate Dusty. Once he has collected the key, he can proceed to the next level.
summary: Dusty the Lazy Cat is a puzzle game where the main character Dusty goes through different worlds and levels. He must also deal with enemies and solve puzzles.
